org.apache.james.protocols.api
Interface ExtensibleHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCommandDispatcher, AbstractHookableCmdHandler, AuthCmdHandler, DataCmdHandler, DataLineMessageHookHandler, EhloCmdHandler, HeloCmdHandler, MailCmdHandler, QuitCmdHandler, RcptCmdHandler, SMTPCommandDispatcherLineHandler, UnknownCmdHandler
public interface ExtensibleHandler

Handlers extends this interface to be notified of available extensions of the given type.

Method Summary
